trans-unit.target: TEXT_REGSEACAMPSKULLVALLEY_00119_AHTMHAS_000_000<tab>Adventurer! <var 08 E905 ((Ma'am)) ((Sir)) /var>! How might I be of service?
TEXT_REGSEACAMPSKULLVALLEY_00119_AHTMHAS_000_010<tab>Me, <var 08 E905 ((ma'am)) ((sir)) /var>? I am charged with security of this base, <var 08 E905 ((ma'am)) ((sir)) /var>!
TEXT_REGSEACAMPSKULLVALLEY_00119_AHTMHAS_000_011<tab>It has been but a year since I took up this post, but I mean to defend Skull Valley with my life, <var 08 E905 ((ma'am)) ((sir)) /var>!

TEXT_REGSEACAMPSKULLVALLEY_00119_AHTMHAS_000_020<tab>Allow me to explain, <var 08 E905 ((ma'am)) ((sir)) /var>! Skull Valley is an encampment established for the purpose of protecting against Sahagin incursions. Though early contact with the fishbacks resulted in only small-scale skirmishes, they have begun moving against us in greater numbers.
TEXT_REGSEACAMPSKULLVALLEY_00119_AHTMHAS_000_021<tab>Thus, the facilities here were expanded and reinforced to accommodate a larger Maelstrom presence.

TEXT_REGSEACAMPSKULLVALLEY_00119_AHTMHAS_000_022<tab>It would be an honor to have you assist in the many duties that must be performed in order to keep Skull Valley─and perforce, Limsa Lominsa─safe from the Sahagin threat, <var 08 E905 ((ma'am)) ((sir)) /var>!
